mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO task ( task_code, task_date, user_code, year_week, weight, diet_meal_flag, sports_flag, grade, income, fine, task_status ) VALUES ( #{task.taskCode}, #{task.taskDate}, #{task.userCode}, #{task.yearWeek}, #{task.weight}, #{task.dietMealFlag}, #{task.sportsFlag}, #{task.grade}, #{task.income}, #{task.fine}, #{task.taskStatus} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE task_code = VALUES(task_code), task_date = VALUES(task_date), user_code = VALUES(user_code), year_week = VALUES(year_week), weight = VALUES(weight), diet_meal_flag = VALUES(diet_meal_flag), sports_flag = VALUES(sports_flag), grade = VALUES(grade), income = VALUES(income), fine = VALUES(fine), task_status = VALUES(task_status)
mapper.select: SELECT task_date, user_code, year_week, weight, diet_meal_flag, sports_flag, grade, income, fine, task_status, create_time FROM task WHERE task_date = #{taskDate} AND user_code = #{userCode} AND is_del = 0
SELECT task_date, user_code, year_week, weight, diet_meal_flag, sports_flag, grade, income, fine, task_status, create_time FROM task WHERE task_code = #{taskCode} AND is_del = 0

SELECT task_code, task_date, user_code, year_week, weight, diet_meal_flag, sports_flag, grade, income, fine, task_status, create_time FROM task WHERE user_code = #{userCode} AND year_week = #{yearWeek} AND is_del = 0 ORDER BY task_date ASC

SELECT SUM(income) weekIncome, SUM(fine) weekFine, (SELECT money FROM reward WHERE year_week = #{yearWeek} AND user_code = #{userCode} AND reward_type = 1) persevereReward, (SELECT money FROM reward WHERE year_week = #{yearWeek} AND user_code = #{userCode} AND reward_type = 2) progressReward FROM task WHERE user_code = #{userCode} AND year_week = #{yearWeek} AND is_del = 0
SELECT weight FROM task WHERE user_code = #{userCode} AND year_week = #{yearWeek} AND weight != '' AND is_del = 0 ORDER BY task_date DESC LIMIT 1
